document.full_text: halliburton co , the world's second-largest oilfield services company, posted a first-quarter profit that beat analysts' estimates as oil companies increased spending on new projects to meet growing oil demand worldwide.
document.title: halliburton profit beats estimates
lines_and_colors: halliburton co , the world's second-largest oilfield services company, posted a first-quarter profit that beat analysts' estimates as oil companies increased spending on new projects to meet growing oil demand worldwide.
